title: Adversary attempts unauthorized cross-biz read Snapshot

view.title: Adversary attempts unauthorized cross-biz read
view.subtitle: Cross-biz read blocked for non-member account.

blocks.title: Adversary Cross Biz Read completed
blocks.message: Cross-biz read blocked for non-member account.

resultPayload.note: Cross-biz read blocked for non-member account.

data.instruction: Create a booking order using the published offer version with realistic times and monetary totals.
data.expectedResult: Booking order is created and linked to offer/offer version with coherent totals.

data.instruction: Create an offer representing the UC primary service; choose execution mode matching the scenario.
data.expectedResult: Offer is created in draft state with captured id.

data.instruction: Create at least one host resource and one non-host resource (asset or venue) suitable for the UC.
data.expectedResult: Resources are created with expected type, location, and buffers.

data.instruction: Create customer account/session and verify customer can browse published offers.
data.expectedResult: Customer session established and offer discovery succeeds.
